Plane¶

class decodes.core.dc_plane.Plane(point=pt[0,0,0], normal=vec[0,0,1])¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_base.Geometry

a simple plane class

__init__(point=pt[0,0,0], normal=vec[0,0,1])¶

Plane constructor.

Parameters:
  • point (Point) – Base point for a plane.
  • normal (Vec) – Normal direction of the new Plane. Defaults to Vec(0,0,1).
Result :

Plane object.
Return type:

Plane
d¶

The distance of this plane from the origin

static from_pts(pt_a, pt_b, pt_c)¶

Constructs plane from points. A plane cannot be constructed from collinear points.

Parameters:
  • pt_a (Point) – First point.
  • pt_b (Point) – Second point.
  • pt_c (Point) – Third point.
Result :

Plane object.
Return type:

Plane
is_coplanar(other, tolerance=1e-06)¶

Returns True if the planes are co-planar within a given tolerance.

Parameters:
  • other (Plane) – Plane to be compared.
  • tolerance (float) – Tolerance of difference between the two planes.
Result :

Boolean result of comparison.
Return type:

bool
is_identical(other)¶

Returns True if the planes are equal.

Parameters:other (Plane) – Plane to be compared.
Result :Boolean result of comparison.
Return type:bool
near(p)¶

Returns a tuple of the closest point to a given Plane, its t value, and the distance from the given point to the near point.

Parameters:p (Point) – Point to look for a near point on the plane.
Result :Tuple of near point on plane, t value and distance from given point to near point.
Return type:(Point, float, float)
near_pt(p)¶

Returns the closest point to the point provided on a given Plane.

Parameters:p (Point) – Point to look for a near Point on the Plane.
Result :Near point on Plane.
Return type:Point
normal¶

Returns the plane’s normal.

Result :Plane’s normal.
Return type:Vec
origin¶

Returns the plane’s origin point.

Result :Plane’s origin point.
